Text: Multi Virus Cleaner is a free, stand-alone utility used to detect and remove major viruses. It is not a substitute for full anti-virus protection, but rather a tool to assist administrators and users when cleaning infected systems. Multi Virus Cleaner is regularly updated and can detect over 14,000 common viruses, worms, trojans and dialers (including all variants of the Sober, MyDoom and Bagle viruses).
